unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Necessary evil, I tell you! Heard farmers in Maharashtra struggling last monsoon. My uncle, Krishnan from Kerala, says it's a lifesaver, especially with unpredictable rains during Onam season. Bureaucracy can be a pain though, right? Getting the Rs. 5000 payout after all the damage is like pulling teeth! Hopefully, things are improving, maybe like the PM Fasal Bima Yojana is actually helping. Need transparency, yaar! Makes me want some biryani and a good policy review.
